page.title: 09Arts And Crafts Of Dent.
page.content: Living in Dentdale are a number of art and craft people.An artist has his studio just off the Main Street.John Cooke who works in all media,excelling in watercolour.He holds regular exhibitions in London,and has had some of his paintings bought by The Post Office to advertise their services. In the Main Street can be found a shop selling black and white photographs taken by the Forders who have just published a most interesting book of local photographs called " Open Fell, Hidden Dale." Knitters of Dent knit beautiful garments by hand to sell in the shop called by their name.This is not surprising as during both World Wars Knitters of Dent became famous for knitting socks,Balaclava helmets and gloves to keep the soldiers warm.All of the garments are different.
